name: Permissible uses of display fireworks, articles pyrotechnic, and aerial devices
text: Display fireworks, articles pyrotechnic, and aerial devices may be purchased, set off, ignited, or otherwise caused to explode in the State only if for display and permitted in writing pursuant to sections 132D-10 and 132D-16. [L 1994, c 180, pt of §1; am L 2000, c 233, §6; am L 2006, c 183, §5]
